metadata.title: Sublime Text
metadata.intro: A visual cheat-sheet for the 49 keyboard shortcuts found in Sublime Text

cards.title: Editing
cards.body:
| Shortcut               | Action                                                                    |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `X`             | Cut line                                                                  |
| `Ctrl` `Enter`         | Insert line after                                                         |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Enter` | Insert line before                                                        |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Up`    | Move line/selection up                                                    |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Down`  | Move line/selection down                                                  |
| `Ctrl` `L`             | Select line - Repeat to select next lines                                 |
| `Ctrl` `D`             | Select word - Repeat selects other occurrences                            |
| `Ctrl` `M`             | Jump to closing parentheses - Repeat to jump to opening parentheses       |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `M`     | Select all contents of the current parentheses                            |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `K`     | Delete line                                                               |
| `Ctrl` `K, K`          | Delete from cursor to end of line                                         |
| `Ctrl` `K` `Backspace` | Delete from cursor to start of line                                       |
| `Ctrl` `]`             | Indent current line(s)                                                    |
| `Ctrl` `[`             | Un-indent current line(s)                                                 |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `D`     | Duplicate line(s)                                                         |
| `Ctrl` `J`             | Join line below to the end of the current line                            |
| `Ctrl` `/`             | Comment/un-comment current line                                           |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `/`     | Block comment current selection                                           |
| `Ctrl` `Y`             | Redo, or repeat last keyboard shortcut command                            |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `V`     | Paste and indent correctly                                                |
| `Ctrl` `Space`         | Select next auto-complete suggestion                                      |
| `Ctrl` `U`             | Soft undo; jumps to your last change before undoing, change when repeated |
| `Alt` `Shift` `W`      | Wrap selection in HTML tag                                                |
| `Alt` `.`              | Close current HTML tag                                                    |
| `Alt` `Q`              | Hard wrap line to ruler column setting                                    |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Select line - Repeat to select next lines
Select word - Repeat selects other occurrences
Jump to closing parentheses - Repeat to jump to opening parentheses
Select all contents of the current parentheses
Delete from cursor to end of line
Delete from cursor to start of line
Join line below to the end of the current line
Redo, or repeat last keyboard shortcut command
Soft undo; jumps to your last change before undoing, change when repeated
Hard wrap line to ruler column setting

cards.title: Navigation
cards.body:
| Shortcut   | Action                    |
| ---------- | ------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `P` | Quick-open files by name  |
| `Ctrl` `R` | Goto symbol               |
| `Ctrl` `;` | Goto word in current file |
| `Ctrl` `G` | Goto line in current file |

{.shortcuts}

cards.title: General
cards.body:
| Shortcut                 | Action                   |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------ |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `P`       | Command prompt           |
| `Ctrl` `K, B`            | Toggle sidebar           |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `Alt` `P` | Show scope in status bar |

{.shortcuts}

cards.title: Find/Replace
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action        |
| ------------------ | ------------- |
| `Ctrl` `F`         | Find          |
| `Ctrl` `H`         | Replace       |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `F` | Find in files |

{.shortcuts}

cards.title: Split window
cards.body:
| Shortcut             | Action                                           |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `Alt` `Shift` `1`    | Revert view to single column                     |
| `Alt` `Shift` `2`    | Split view into two columns                      |
| `Alt` `Shift` `3`    | Split view into three columns                    |
| `Alt` `Shift` `4`    | Split view into four columns                     |
| `Alt` `Shift` `5`    | Set view to grid (4 groups)                      |
| `Alt` `Shift` `8`    | Split view into two rows                         |
| `Ctrl` `1-4`         | Jump to group where number is 1-4                |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `1-4` | Move file to specified group where number is 1-4 |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Jump to group where number is 1-4
Move file to specified group where number is 1-4

cards.title: Bookmarks
cards.body:
| Shortcut            | Action            |
| ------------------- | ----------------- |
| `Ctrl` `F2`         | Toggle bookmark   |
| `F2`                | Next bookmark     |
| `Shift` `F2`        | Previous bookmark |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `F2` | Clear bookmarks   |

{.shortcuts}

cards.title: Text manipulation
cards.body:
| Shortcut      | Action                 |
| ------------- | ---------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `K, U` | Transform to uppercase |
| `Ctrl` `K, L` | Transform to lowercase |

{.shortcuts}
